name: Dice of Life (MzStudio)
description:
Will Lady luck be on your side and grant you the freedom you deserve? 

Not all enemies can be killed, and you bounce around frantically when taking damage from them or when pressing the button!

CONTROLS:

A - Left

D- RIght

Space bar- Jump (You can do a double jump!)

Take your chance in this 2D Survival Platformer game submitted for the Mini Jam 83:Dread!

* *Note: First time playing will take a minute or two to load.
